indexDescription.ar: نبذة عن بدر الهاشمي مثل مهاراته التي قد تساعده في السيطرة على العالم!
indexDescription.en: Information about @BaderSur like his skills which may help him to conquer this world!

projectsDescription.en: Some projects that @BaderSur has done so far.

coursesDescription.en: Most of the online courses that @BaderSur has completed!

greeting.en: Hi and welcome to my website! My name is Bader Nasser Al-Hashmi. I'm a [software engineer](/en/projects/) and an [open source contributor](https://github.com/BaderSur).

contact.ar: تواصل معي للعمل معا أو للتناقش في بعض الأمور التقنية.
contact.en: Feel free to contact me for job offers or to discuss technical stuff.

notFound.ar: لقد وصلت إلى صفحة غير موجودة... مع الأسف.
notFound.en: You just hit a route that doesn't exist... the sadness.
